gcc
stadd			virtual
0x00100000 00009570	0x00e9 9570	0x00e99570	(0x00e9) 0000 0000 1110 1001
			0x0000 9570			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00102a00 00008320	0x00fb 8320	0x00fb8320
0x0010c200 0000a7e0	0x021f a7e0	0x021fa7e0
0x00111800 0000da90	0x0364 da90	0x0364da90
0x00130600 00005a00	0x03d5 5a00	0x03d55a00

fccx
dynamic
0x00100000 00150540	0x03d5 0540	0x03d50540	(0x03d5) 0000 0011 1101 0101
			0x0015 0540			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00100000 0014e530	0x03d4 e530	0x03d4e530
			0x0014 e530
0x00100200 001f65f0	0x03df 65f0	0x03df65f0	(0x03df) 0000 0011 1101 1111
	   		0x001f 65f0			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00100200 000ad7e0	0x02aa d7e0	0x02aad7e0	(0x02aa) 0000 0010 1010 1010
			0x000a d7e0			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00101c00 000e9a00	0x04ae 9a00	0x04ae9a00	(0x04ae) 0000 0100 1010 1110
			0x000e 9a00			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00102000 0003fa40	0x04c3 fa40	0x04c3fa40	(0x04c3) 0000 0100 1100 0011
			0x0003 fa40			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00100200 00153510	0x0415 3510	0x04153510	(0x0415) 0000 0100 0001 0101
			0x0015 3510			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00101400 001535a0	0x1195 35a0	0x119535a0	(0x1195) 0001 0001 1001 0101
	   		0x0015 35a0			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0001 1111
0x00103e00 00000010	0x4000 0f40 0010		(0x0f40) 0000
  staddr = 0x103e0000000010
  virt   = 0x0040000f400010
  staddr = 0x10400000005010
  virt   = 0x00400017605010

  staddr = 0x0010000000000010
           0xfffffff000000000
  virt   = 0x000040000f400010

  staddr = 0x0010020000005010
           0xfffffff000000000
  virt   = 0x000040010f605010

 staddr = 0x001004000000a010
  virt   = 0x000040030f80a010

static
0x00100000 0000c458	0x0204 c458	0x0204c458	(0x0204) 0000 0010 0000 0100
			0x0000 c458			(0x001f) 0000 0000 0000 0000
----

num_reserved_stags: 256 (
Steering Address (TAG<<32 + offset)
stadd
0x000f0b00 00000000	stag=11
0x000f0e00 00000000     stag=14
0x00100000 00000000
0x00100000 0000d930	0xffffffffd930, stack
0x00100200 00007950	0x447950, bss
0x00100400 00000410	0x420410, data
0x00100200 00007970	0x80447970, bss
0x00100c00 00007970	0x40447970, data 1G
0x00100600 00006100	0x486100, malloc 1k
0x00100600 0000d100	0x48d100, posix_memalign 1K
0x00100800 00000010	0x400009000010, malloc 512K
0x00103c00 00000010	0x4006891a0010, malloc 27GB

Virtual address
HEAP
0x00004006 891a0010
0x00004000 09000010
DATA
0x00100400 00000410

0xfffffff000000000
#define MAKE_KEY(stadd, virt)	(((stadd) & 0xfffffff000000000LL) | ((virt)&0x0000000fffffffffLL))
#define KEY_STADD(key, virt)
(((key) & 0xfffffff000000000LL) | (((((virt)&0x0000000fffffffffLL)) -  ((key)&0x0000000fffffffffLL)) + ((key)&0xffffLL)))
#define EXTRCT_STADD(key) ((uint64_t)(key)&0xfffffff00000ffffLL)

struct memregion {
       uint64_t	a32:40,	/* virtual address */
		rsv:12,
		type:4,
		zero:16;
};


struct stadd {
       uint64_t	a32:32,	/* virtual address */
                a8:8,
		stag:8,
		type:8,
		rsv:8;
};

REGION TYPE
0 : stack
1 : heap
2 : MMAP
3 : Text
4 : Data

TYPE(1B) STADD(2B) REGION_ADDR(6B)

MMAP
400000387300
USER
0000000000000000	000003ffffffffff 2level
0000000000000000	0000ffffffffffff 3level

STACK
HEAP
MMAP


https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/stable/linux.git/tree/Documentation/arm64/memory.txt?h=v4.19.147
